attributes.action: Hold a second EU referendum because the leave campaign  misrepresented EU costs.
attributes.additional_details: This they now deny. They continued to campaign that the country would be £350m a week better off because they would not have to pay this money to the EU. This was a deliberate misrepresentation of the truth. They have now said the campaign was not about migration but this was the keystone of their campaign. These blatant lies are tantamount to misselling jn the same way as PPI was missold to the public.
attributes.background: Brexit have totally mislead the public by repeatedly making claims that the NHS would receive additional funding after leaving the EU.
